Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Classes.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bomb, Explosion, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity Object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point position, Images images) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEntity(Entity entity)
      Add a new entity to the game.
      void changeImageIndex()
      Change the index of the image used by the entity to play an animation.
      void destroy()
      Remove the entity from the entity array, cutting all reference to him so the gc will be free to free the memory.
      Images getImageEnum()
      Return the ArrayList containing all the images used by the entity.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of the entity.
      static Images getPlayerImages(int number)
      Return the images needed in function of the player number.
      java.awt.Point getPosition()
      Return the actual position of the entity.
      java.awt.Point move(Direction direction, int speed)
      Return a new position moved in a given direction according to his speed.
      abstract void tick()
      Do all the action needed by the entity during a turn ( move, die, ...).

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
